meanings.definition: The position or role of a foreman.
meanings.sent1: His foremanships at the construction site ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: She was promoted to foremanships after years of hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The foremanships of the cat in the house involved overseeing the other pets.
meanings.sent4: His foremanships were like a guiding light, leading the team through challenging projects.
meanings.sent5: The foremanships of the captain on the ship kept everyone safe during the storm.

meanings.definition: The skills or qualities necessary to be a successful foreman.
meanings.sent1: His strong leadership and organization skills were evident in his foremanships.
meanings.sent2: Training programs help develop the foremanships needed for effective management.
meanings.sent3: The foremanships of juggling multiple tasks simultaneously came in handy during the event.
meanings.sent4: Her foremanships in decision-making were crucial in resolving conflicts within the team.
meanings.sent5: Acquiring the necessary foremanships takes time and dedication to excel in the role.
